insuranceStartByEmployment.description: Insurance from the beginning of employment. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

insuranceTemporaryEmployees.description: Insurance of temporarily employed persons (temporary employment up to 3 months). Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

insuranceParttimeEmployees.description: Insurance of part-time employees (less than 8 working hours per week). Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

insuranceHourlyEmployees.description: Insurance of employees on an hourly basis (at least 8 working hours per week). Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

insuranceEmployeesExhaustedBenefitPeriod.description: Insurance of persons with exhausted benefit period. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

insuranceChildFamilyAllowances.description: Insurance of child and family allowances. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

insuranceWageIncreaseIncapacity.description: Insurance agreed wage increases before incapacity for work. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

subsequentPaymentsAfterDeath.description: Supplementary salary in the event of death in accordance with Art. 338 OR. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

waiverBenefitGrossNegligence.description: Waiver of benefit reductions in the event of gross negligence. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

unpaidLeaveInsurance.description: Unpaid leave insurance. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

renunciationCreditingWaitingPeriod.description: Waiver of crediting of the waiting period in the event of continued incapacity for work after UVG rejection of accident causality. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

subsequentBenefitsContractTermination.description: Entitlement to subsequent payment at end of contract (without vested benefits). Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.
